text: Sergio Sanchez Hernandez (born May 16, 1968 in Barcelona) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T12/B2 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished first in the 4 X 400 meter T11-T13 race. He finished second in the 400 meter T12 race. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona
title: Sergio Sanchez Hernandez
